dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: The Arcade Learning Environment (ALE) is a challenging framework composed of dozens of Atari 2600 games used to evaluate general competency in AI.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: Basic features tile the screen and check if each of the available colors in the Atari 2600 are active in each tile.
dcterms:title: Basic Features

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: BASS features add pairwise combinations of Basic features.
dcterms:title: BASS Features

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: DISCO features attempt to detect and classify objects on the screen in order to infer their positions and velocities.
dcterms:title: DISCO Features

dcterms:creator: A. Gionis
P. Indyk
R. Motwani
dcterms:description: Locally Sensitive Hashing (LSH) applies hashing techniques to raw Atari 2600 screens for similarity search.
dcterms:title: Locally Sensitive Hashing (LSH)

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: Contingency Awareness Features (CAF) identify which parts of the screen are under the agent's direct control.
dcterms:title: Contingency Awareness Features (CAF)

dcterms:description: Blob features represent coarsened positions of blobs on the screen.
dcterms:title: Blob Features

dcterms:description: B-PROS Features capture pairwise relative distances between objects in a single screen.
dcterms:title: B-PROS Features

dcterms:description: B-PROT Features represent pairwise relative oﬀsets between Basic features obtained from the screen five frames in the past and Basic features from the current screen.
dcterms:title: B-PROT Features

dcterms:description: Blob-PROS Features are constructed from Blob features and capture pairwise relative distances between blobs.
dcterms:title: Blob-PROS Features

dcterms:description: Blob-PROT Features are constructed from Blob features and represent pairwise relative oﬀsets between blobs obtained from the screen five frames in the past and blobs from the current screen.
dcterms:title: Blob-PROT Features
